title: Best Black Friday MacBook deals
content:
Macworld

The big day is here: Black Friday, the biggest shopping event of the year. But no matter what day it is, if are looking for a great deal on a new MacBook Pro or MacBook Air you have come to the right place.

We check all the best resellers in the U.S. and the U.K. all months long, so we always have our fingers on the pulse of the best deals you can and could get – which means we know exactly what the best MacBook deals are. Below you will also find the best prices for MacBooks that are available right now.

We also have some shopping tips that should help you get the best deals available on Black Friday. If you would like to buy an iMac, Mac mini or Mac Studio check out our round-up of the Best Black Friday Mac deals for the best desktop discounts.

Our bargain hunters have hand-picked the best MacBook deals currently available as the Black Friday season approaches., read on to find out how much you can save.

Black Friday 2023: Top 5 MacBook deals

  1. 15-inch M2 MacBook Air with 256GB of storage: $1,049 at Amazon ($250 off)
  2. 14-inch M3 MacBook Pro with 512GB of storage: $1,449 at Amazon ($150 off)
  3. 16-inch M3 Pro MacBook Pro (12-core CPU, 18-core GPU, 512GB of storage): $2,299 at Amazon ($200 off)
  4. 13-inch M1 MacBook Air, M1 with 256GB of storage: $749 at Amazon ($250 off)
  5. 16-inch M1 Pro MacBook Pro (M1 Pro, 10-core CPU, 1TB of storage): $1,749 at Amazon ($950 off)

Black Friday: Apple’s shopping event

Each year Apple holds a Black Friday four-day shopping event, but rather than offering discounts it just gives gift vouchers for certain products. In 2023 you can get gift cards for the following amounts with the following Mac purchases made on Apple’s U.S. site or Apple’s U.K. site.

The MacBook Pro has recently been updated to the M3, M3 Pro and M3 Max and in the U.K. these models are already being discounted. There are also some discounts to be had on the older M2-series models.

For more deals take a look at our Best MacBook Pro deals and latest MacBook Air deals round-ups.

Black Friday shopping tips

  • We tend to find that the best savings are on older models.
  • Check the generation of the model that is discounted to make sure you know exactly what you are buying and what it’s really worth.
  • We’ve seen resellers switch to selling refurbished or used when the stock of brand-new models run out, so check that the model discounted isn’t actually a used Mac and therefore not as good a deal as it might look.
  • That’s not to say you should avoid refurb models – you just need to make sure that you aren’t buying refurb without knowing.
  • Mac deals aren’t limited to Black Friday. We see good deals all year round, so don’t feel pressured into buying during Black Friday.

Best resellers for Black Friday deals

Look out for the best deals over the Black Friday week, but many resellers are already offering Black Friday discounts.

U.S.

Adorama is advertising Holiday Deals.

Amazon has Holiday Deals.

Best Buy’s Black Friday sale has started.

Walmart’s Black Friday deals have already started.

U.K.

  • KRCS has already reduced Mac prices by 10%.
  • AO.com has various Black Friday savings.
  • Laptops Direct’s Black Friday sale has started.
  • eBuyer has a Black Friday Early Access Sale with up to 45% off.
  • Very‘s Black Friday sales is underway.
  • John Lewis is running Black Friday deals.
  • Currys has up to 40% off for Black Friday.
  • Argos has a price promise that the prices won’t go any lower for Black Friday.
  • Amazon’s Black Friday week starts on 17 November.
